ComicInfo.Summary:
Freddy Is Another Name for Fear!: Two doctors scheme to use Freddy to kill each other.
Bayou Witch: Heck Belleau accuses an old woman of being a witch.
I Married a Ghost: When Gil's fiance is killed on their wedding night her ghost returns.
